9 namespace Kassiopeia

11 
12  KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate() :
13  fLifeTime( 0. ),
14  fTargetPID( 0 ),
15  fminPID( 0 ),
16  fmaxPID( 0 ),
17  fDecayProductGenerator( NULL )
18  {
19  }
20 
21  KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate( const KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate& aCopy ) :
22  KSComponent(),
23  fLifeTime( aCopy.fLifeTime ),
24  fTargetPID( aCopy.fTargetPID ),
25  fminPID( aCopy.fminPID ),
26  fmaxPID( aCopy.fmaxPID ),
27  fDecayProductGenerator( aCopy.fDecayProductGenerator )

31  KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate* KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::Clone() const
32  {
33  return new KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate( *this );
34  }

36  KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::~KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate()

38  }
39 
40  void KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::CalculateLifeTime( const KSParticle& aParticle,
41  double& aLifeTime )
42  {
43  long long tPID = aParticle.GetPID();
44  if ( (tPID == fTargetPID && fTargetPID != 0) || ( (tPID >= fminPID) && ( tPID <= fmaxPID)) )
45  {
46  aLifeTime = fLifeTime;
47  } else
48  {
49  aLifeTime = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
50  }
51  return;
52  }
53 
54  void KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::ExecuteInteraction( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle,
55  KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
56  KSParticleQueue& aSecondaries)
57  {
58  aFinalParticle.SetTime( anInitialParticle.GetTime() );
59  aFinalParticle.SetPosition( anInitialParticle.GetPosition() );
60  aFinalParticle.SetMomentum( anInitialParticle.GetMomentum() );
61 
62  if ( (anInitialParticle.GetPID() == fTargetPID && fTargetPID != 0) || ( (anInitialParticle.GetPID() >= fminPID) && ( anInitialParticle.GetPID() <= fmaxPID)) )
63  {
64  double tTime = aFinalParticle.GetTime();
65  KThreeVector tPosition = aFinalParticle.GetPosition();
66 
67  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
68  aFinalParticle.SetActive(false);
69  if(fDecayProductGenerator != NULL)
70  {
71  KSParticleQueue tDecayProducts;
72 
73  fDecayProductGenerator->ExecuteGeneration(tDecayProducts);
74 
75  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
76  for( tParticleIt = tDecayProducts.begin(); tParticleIt != tDecayProducts.end(); tParticleIt++ )
77  {
78  (*tParticleIt)->SetTime((*tParticleIt)->GetTime()+tTime);
79  (*tParticleIt)->SetPosition((*tParticleIt)->GetPosition()+tPosition);
80  }
81 
82  aSecondaries = tDecayProducts;
83  }
84 
85  fStepNDecays = 1;
86  fStepEnergyLoss = 0.;
87  }
88 
89  return;
90  }
91 
92  void KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::SetDecayProductGenerator( KSGenerator* aGenerator )
93  {
94  if( fDecayProductGenerator == NULL )
95  {
96  fDecayProductGenerator = aGenerator;
97  return;
98  }
99  intmsg( eError ) << "cannot set decay product generator <" << aGenerator->GetName() << "> to decay calculator <" << GetName() << ">" << eom;
100  return;
101  }
102 
103  KSGenerator* KSIntDecayCalculatorDeathConstRate::GetDecayProductGenerator() const
104  {
105  return fDecayProductGenerator;
106  }
107 }
